column5: Just curious, with the senko craze STILL kicking around, what colours are everyone throwing?  For the poll, dont worry about fleck colours, explain that in a post.  For me, I would call black the best all around colour
senko... isn't that 5 in Spanish??
I think it is a brand of coffee?????????
bubblegum pink!!
smoke with purple and black flake........

Up until this year it would have been white, but black has pushed it to 2nd place  If the brand you buy does bleed when colors are mixed throw a couple white in a bag of smoke. That's my other fav colour. Ends up coming out like a smelt colour
Yum with the Chartruese tip, but don't use them much Richard
Watermelon 85% of the time, and black/chartreuse in second.
Have to say...I'm done throwing senkos. Used to be my go to.  But lately it just doesn't do it for me anymore.
White or Watermelon
Pink would be mine.
5" GREEN PUMPKIN STRIKE KING ZERO. caught more largies on that then any other bait
this year i have been using the watermelon/cream with great success , but i caught fish on every colour i used
black with blue flake is my fav
There are only 3 colours of senkos: dark, light and in-between. I throw dark green 90% of the time, but would throw black if I ran out.
Purple with emerald fleck - colour 213 (I think)
5" watermelon with red fleck
Bubblegum works great on Rice Lake.  Dirk
5" black sinking minnows is one deadly bait for bass up here!!! Leechman
Yup, you got that one dead on.
